scripts.prisma:generate:root: setx PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE binary && pnpm prisma:merge && prisma generate --schema ./prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:generate:api: setx PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE binary && dotenv -e apps/api/prisma/.env -- npx prisma db pull --schema ./apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma && prisma generate --schema ./apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma && node scripts/rearrange-dtos-entities.js && tsx scripts/generate-modules.ts
scripts.prisma:db-pull:api: setx PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE binary && dotenv -e apps/api/prisma/.env -- npx prisma db pull --schema=apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
scripts.prisma:migrate:dev: setx PRISMA_CLIENT_ENGINE_TYPE binary && pnpm prisma:merge && prisma migrate dev --schema ./apps/api/prisma/schema.prisma
